verbose_text: To determine whether TULA-2 regulates primary signaling from the CLEC-2 receptor, we preincubated WT and TULA-2 -/- platelets with 10-muM MRS-2179 to antagonize the P2Y1 receptor, 100-nM AR-C69931MX to antagonize the P2Y12 receptor, and 10-muM indomethacin to inhibit thromboxane production prior to stimulation with 5-mug/mL CLEC-2 antibody and 10-mug/mL IgG.
evidence:

 -/- 
platelets with 10-muM MRS-2179 to antagonize the P2Y1 receptor
